content: {"name": "Salvation Army Chester Corps", "alternate_name": "", "description": "", "email": "", "url": "https://pa.salvationarmy.org/chester/Social-Services", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "151 West 15th Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Chester", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19013", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.859204, "longitude": -75.36266}, "phones": [{"number": "(610) 874-4266", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Delivery may be available"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}]}
